sentences.sentence: Schistosomiasis, or bilharzia, is a parasitic disease caused by trematode flatworms of the genus Schistosoma.
sentences.translation: 血吸虫病（又称裂体吸虫病）是由裂体吸虫属血吸虫引起的一种寄生虫病。

sentences.sentence: Each year, two hundred eighty thousand people die of schistosomiasis, also known as bilharzia or snail fever.
sentences.translation: 每年有28万人死于血吸虫病，此病也叫做裂体血吸虫或蜗牛热。

sentences.sentence: In many parts of the world, inadequate management of irrigation is linked to increased risks of malaria, schistosomiasis (bilharzia) and other vector-borne diseases.
sentences.translation: 在世界的许多地区，灌溉的不适当管理与疟疾、血吸虫病(裂体血吸虫)以及其它媒体传播疾病的增加风险有关。
